!Fishermen's Guild Member: In the Forest of Mirrors, if you hunt *Taik Orcs, Taik Orc Warriors, Taik Orc captains, Forest of Mirrors ghosts, mirrors, Harit Lizardman grunts, Harit Lizardman Warriors, or Harit Lizardman shamans*, you can get the sweet aromatic fluid the water spirits love.
